programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: National Ball Hockey League
programme.desc: Lace up your shoes and hit the rink -- it's hockey like you've never seen it. Catch the fast-paced action of Tier 1 New Jersey teams in the National Ball Hockey League!

programme.title: 2025 Blackbird Cup - Alberta Pro Roller Hockey League
programme.desc: The championship game of the Alberta ProRoller Hockey League (APRHL), highlighting Canada's emerging inline hockey talent, community roots, and diverse player stories.

programme.title: Major League Paintball
programme.desc: Watch the Great American Events on ESPN.

programme.title: 2025 NWLA All-Star Game
programme.desc: Top Wiffle Ball® leagues from across the country come together for the NWLA All-Star Game -- a fast-paced, backyard showdown of elite national talent.

programme.title: OmegaBall World Invitational
programme.desc: Three-team soccer with no offsides, on a circular pitch. Teams defend their own goal, but can score on the other two, and it's 10x more goals than traditional soccer!

programme.title: The 4th Annual BullShooter Invitational Shootout
programme.desc: Watch as a selection of the world's best darts players battle for glory after a dominant run on the 2024-2025 BullShooter Tour. Who will take the title -- and who will make history in the first-ever Ladies Invitational Bracket?

programme.title: Turf Wars Adult Kickball Tournament
programme.desc: Turf Wars hits ESPN The Ocho for its 4th year! Top kickball teams from around the globe compete in a high-speed, high-stakes showdown packed with big kicks and bold moves.

programme.title: Diving Chess: Duel in the Depths
programme.desc: Two champions face off in a high-stakes underwater chess match -- where every move is made on a single breath.

programme.title: Live: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: From Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez in Mexico City.

programme.title: Slippery Stairs
programme.desc: It's controlled chaos as contestants are challenged with unpredictable steps, slippery slime, dodging balls and the goal of being the first one to the top. Slippery Stairs, wild and fun, returns with new contestants, new stairs and new champions!

programme.title: USPA Polo: 2024 C.V. Whitney Cup
programme.desc: Highlights and analysis from polo's 2024 C.V. Whitney Cup.

programme.title: Live: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: From Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez in Mexico City.

programme.title: The Popdarts Championship Presented by APL
programme.desc: From viral sensation to national sport -- four top players battle for $10,000 in a high-stakes competition of skill and precision. Each throw echoes with the pop that started it all. This is more than a game. It's the PopdartsChampionship!

programme.title: 2025 Extreme Archery Championship
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of Extreme Archery as elite teams from the USA and Canada face off in a fast-paced arena battle with foam-tipped arrows. Dodge, shoot, and strategize -- non-stop action makes this a must-watch for fans of unconventional sports!

programme.title: Pop-A-Shot 2025 National Championship
programme.desc: The Pop-A-Shot 2025 National Championship brings together the top qualifiers from across the country. A head-to-head, tournament-style competition and the thrilling finale of the Pop-A-Shot National Series.

programme.title: The National Dodgeball League Championship Games
programme.desc: The National Dodgeball League Championship returns as part of the Ocho Show! Don't miss the Men's Finals, featuring some of the world's top dodgeball athletes in this premier U.S. competition.

programme.title: Pillow Fight Championship
programme.desc: The world's only Professional Pillow Fighting league -- returns to The Ocho featuring fighters from various disciplines competing for a cash purse and ultimate bragging rights in the Hush Presents PFC tournament.

programme.title: 360 Hoops Championship
programme.desc: Watch the Great American Events on ESPN.

programme.title: Padel Ping Pong Championship
programme.desc: A mixture of Ping Pong and Squash, this innovative sport creates a creative blend of hand eye coordination, power and finesse. It's the Padel Ping Pong Championship, two on two competition from the sport's birthplace in Sweden.

programme.title: Bike Polo
programme.desc: The mastery of polo meets the intensity of biking. Watch as this innovative sport takes to the streets of Brooklyn New York, with City bragging rights on the line.

programme.title: Freestyle Chess Grand Slam - Paris Final: Best Of Show
programme.desc: ESPN8 presents highlights from the epic final between Magnus Carlsen and Hikaru Nakamura in Paris -- featuring key moments, tactics, emotions, interviews, and the intensity of this groundbreaking chess format.

programme.title: World Series of Armwrestling Finals Season 3
programme.desc: The World Series of Armwrestling brings the top arm wrestlers around the US to compete for over $100,000 in cash and prizes in the largest cash tournament in the world!

programme.title: National Ball Hockey League
programme.desc: Lace up your shoes and hit the rink -- it's hockey like you've never seen it. Catch the fast-paced action of Tier 1 New Jersey teams in the National Ball Hockey League!

programme.title: Live: Fantasy Football Now
programme.desc: "Fantasy Football Now" airs live on Sunday mornings during the NFL season, a time when fans are making last-minute roster moves and need the latest news from around the league. Providing the latest info are host Field Yates, analysts Mike Clay and Damien Woody, and senior writer and injury analyst Stephania Bell. Also contributing to the show are ESPN's NFL reporters, who bring fantasy players the latest intel from game sites and, in many cases, straight from the coach's mouth to give fantasy owners everything they need to know to set their lineups.

programme.title: College Football Final
programme.desc: Once the day's slate of college football games is complete, ESPN recaps the action and discusses its implications on the top 25. Matt Barrie hosts with analysts Joey Galloway and Dan Mullen.

programme.title: Ultimate Ninja World Series Finals
programme.desc: The Ultimate Ninja World Series Finals is a culmination of the best of the best athletes in the world at ninja obstacles. It is the largest ninja obstacle competition in the world and these pros are vying for pride and prize money.

programme.title: The National Dodgeball League Championship Games
programme.desc: The National Dodgeball League Championship returns as part of the Ocho Show! Don't miss the Men's Finals, featuring some of the world's top dodgeball athletes in this premier U.S. competition.

programme.title: World Axe & Knife Throwing Championship 2025
programme.desc: Axes and knives fly as we watch the finals to crown World Champions in all Axe and Knife Throwing disciplines for the 2025 World Axe & Knife Throwing Championship.

programme.title: The 2025 Big Boy Soap Hockey Tournament
programme.desc: The biggest and baddest soap hockey league in the world faces off in an eight-team, single elimination tournament to win the ultimate prize... the Golden Duck.

programme.title: World Premiere: BBA Bubbleball
programme.desc: The rules of bubbleball have changed. BBA bubbleball demonstrates the sports side of a game known for 10 years to only be a form of human bumper cars...until now.

programme.desc: The Orlando Magic are considered the fairytale team of the mid-'90s whose popularity grew, in part, due to players like Shaquille O'Neal and Penny Hardaway.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Through interviews with Isiah Thomas, Bill Laimbeer, Joe Dumars, Dennis Rodman, Adrian Dantley, Mark Aguirre and others, viewers are provided an inside look at what made the Detroit Pistons, of the late 80's and early 90's, tick.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: The Domonique Foxworth Show
programme.desc: Domonique Foxworth shares his take on current sports events and participants.

programme.title: Overreaction Monday
programme.desc: A weekly staple on 'The Rich Eisen Show' since 2018, 'Overreaction Monday' is now also an extended podcast with Rich and Chris Brockman debating the latest in the NFL.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.desc: Coverage of equestrian events.

programme.title: X Games Recap
programme.desc: The event featured more than 400 athletes competing in 11 extreme sports, from San Diego.

programme.title: Crossworlds
programme.desc: Sci-Fi-Komödie über den netten aber gewöhnlichen Collegestudenten Joe, der in den Kampf um die Erde gegen einen tyrannischen Kriegsherrn aus einer anderen Dimension gerät.

programme.title: Beyond Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: England im 12. Jahrhundert: Es ist eine tödliche Zeit dunkler Tyrannei, schwarzer Magie und einem vogelfreien Bogenschützen namens Robin Hood. Doch der Sheriff von Nottingham entfesselt ein Monster mit Flügeln über der Stadt und den Wäldern, um Robins Männer zu massakrieren und Lady Marian zu fangen.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Als die Sicherheit der Welt von Truppen uralter Kreaturen bedroht wird, vereinen sich die Schildkröten wieder, um den Planeten zu retten. Splinter, der Ratten-Sensei, spürt, dass sich seine vier heranwachsenden Schildkrötenjünger auseinandergelebt haben und sich zusammenschließen müssen, um ein uraltes Monster zu besiegen.

programme.title: Interceptor – Phantom der Ewigkeit
programme.desc: Jake wird von Schlägertypen in seiner Nachbarschaft getötet und kehrt als mystische Figur zurück, um Rache zu nehmen.

programme.title: Der Gott des Chaos
programme.desc: Durant veranstaltet einen Ball, zu dem er Senatoren, Investoren und mögliche Spender einlädt. Der Schwede Gundersen findet heraus, dass Harper nicht an dem Mord an Bohannons Frau beteiligt gewesen sein kann, da der Seargent zu jener Zeit gar nicht mehr in der Army war. Beim Verlegen des Fußbodens erfährt Lily indes mehr über Bohannons Vergangenheit.

programme.title: Der Weg zur Hölle
programme.desc: Bohannon hat sich einer Gruppe von Outlaws angeschlossen, die Durants Züge überfallen und die Löhne der Arbeiter stehlen. Doch Bohannon wird erwischt und wartet nun auf seine Hinrichtung. Lily arbeitet eng mit Durant zusammen, gemeinsam treiben sie den Bahnbau weiter voran. Thor Gunderson muss sich mit entwürdigenden Tätigkeiten über Wasser halten.

programme.title: Ein Pakt mit dem Teufel
programme.desc: Indianer überfallen die Ortschaft Durant, in der Eva mit Mister Tool lebt. Die beiden fliehen nach Hell on Wheels. Dort wird die Prostituierte Nell ermordet und Elam macht sich auf die Suche nach dem Mörder. Cullen Bohannon wartet in der Zwischenzeit auf seine Hinrichtung. Doch im letzten Moment schlägt Durant ihm einen Deal vor: Bohannon soll am Leben bleiben, wenn er wieder für Durant arbeitet.

programme.title: Die Fehde
programme.desc: Als seine Frau ermordet wird, geht ein Detektiv ins Gefängnis, um Rache zu üben. Im Gefängnis entdeckt er ein Geheimnis, für das die Verantwortlichen töten würden.

programme.title: Hunt to Kill
programme.desc: Als Jims (Steve Austin aus der TV-Serie WWE) Teenager-Tochter entführt wird, ist er gezwungen, eine Bande skrupelloser Killer in die Wildnis zu führen, um ihren Anteil an einer verschwundenen Raubüberfall-Partitur zurückzugewinnen.

programme.title: Damage
programme.desc: Lange Jahre saß John Brickner im Gefängnis für einen Totschlag, den er so nicht gewollt hatte, und jetzt, wo er endlich draußen ist, liegt ihm nichts ferner, als erneut mit dem Gesetz in Konflikt zu geraten. Weil er aber dringend Geld braucht für die Operation eines kleinen Mädchens, und er nun mal wenig anderes gelernt hat als Leute zu zermalmen, lässt er sich von einem jungen Gaunerpärchen, in dessen weibliche Hälfte er verliebt ist, überreden, gegen Gewinnbeteiligung durch die illegalen Kampfarenen der Hinterhöfe und Fabrikhallen zu ziehen.

programme.title: Wir waren Soldaten
programme.desc: Die Schlacht von Ia Drang, die erste große Schlacht des Vietnamkriegs, an der amerikanische Truppen beteiligt waren, aus der Sicht der Soldaten, die an ihr teilnahmen.

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: Born as an 18th-century lord, Louis is now a bicentennial vampire, telling his story to an eager biographer. Suicidal after the death of his family, he meets Lestat, a vampire who persuades him to choose immortality over death and become his companion. Eventually, gentle Louis resolves to leave his violent maker, but Lestat guilts him into staying by turning a young girl -- whose addition to the "family" breeds even more conflict.

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: Veteran detective Jimmy Monroe (Bruce Willis) needs money to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, so he decides it's time to sell his prized '52 Pafko baseball card. Before he can turn it into cash, it's stolen, and Jimmy and his partner, Paul (Tracy Morgan), confront a gangster who is obsessed with sports memorabilia. First, Jimmy and Paul have to rescue a beautiful murder-witness who has the key to a fortune in offshore bank accounts.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
programme.desc: This installment marks the return of the seemingly indestructible masked murderer Michael Myers (George P. Wilbur), who is targeting Tommy Doyle (Paul Stephen Rudd), a young man tied into the legacy of the killer and his connections with the Strode family. As the supernatural elements of Michael's macabre abilities are explored, his longtime adversary, Dr. Sam Loomis (Donald Pleasence), is also back in yet another attempt to stop the psychopath's brutal rampages.

programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
programme.desc: Two decades after surviving a massacre on October 31, 1978, former baby sitter Laurie Strode (Jamie Lee Curtis) finds herself hunted by persistent knife-wielder Michael Myers. Laurie now lives in Northern California under an assumed name, where she works as the headmistress of a private school. But it's not far enough to escape Myers, who soon discovers her whereabouts. As Halloween descends upon Laurie's peaceful community, a feeling of dread weighs upon her -- with good reason.

programme.title: Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: He's back for more... When a group of teens win a contest to spend a night in Michael Myers' childhood home to be broadcast live on the Internet, they believe they are in for a little fun and some free publicity. But things go frightfully wrong and the game turns into a struggle to make it out of the house alive.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Forced back into the field after a family tragedy, special agent Tom Brandis leads a new task force investigating a string of robberies.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom's family prepares for an emotional court date; Robbie faces a dilemma; Maeve makes a crucial decision that might change everything.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: As Cliff and Robbie look for a buyer, Aleah and Lizzie question Peaches' former co-workers; Tom and Grasso pursue a lead.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom questions the loyalty of his taskforce; Perry probes his own gang for answers and uncovers a shocking truth.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: With help from an eyewitness, Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case; Perry pays Maeve a visit, while Robbie puts his plan in motion; later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: Living under cover in Brazil, master assassin Arthur Bishop (Jason Statham) springs back into action after an old enemy (Sam Hazeldine) kidnaps the woman (Jessica Alba) he loves. To save her life, Bishop must kill an imprisoned African warlord, a human trafficker (Toby Eddington) and an arms dealer (Tommy Lee Jones), all while making the deaths look like accidents. When things don't go exactly as planned, Bishop turns the tables on the people who forced him out of retirement.

programme.title: Final Destination Bloodlines
programme.desc: Plagued by a violent and recurring nightmare, a college student heads home to track down the one person who might be able to break the cycle of death and save her family from the grisly demise that inevitably awaits them all.

programme.title: Survive the Night
programme.desc: A trauma doctor is forced to operate on a wounded gunman as he and his family are held hostage by the man and his unhinged brother.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In a future where time is money and the wealthy can live forever, Will Salas (Justin Timberlake) is a poor man who rarely has more than a day's worth of life on his time clock. When he saves Henry Hamilton (Matt Bomer) from time thieves, Will receives the gift of a century. However, such a large transaction attracts the attention of the authorities, and when Will is falsely accused of murder, he must go on the run, taking the daughter (Amanda Seyfried) of an incredibly wealthy man with him.

programme.title: Seven
programme.desc: When retiring police Detective William Somerset (Morgan Freeman) tackles a final case with the aid of newly transferred David Mills (Brad Pitt), they discover a number of elaborate and grizzly murders. They soon realize they are dealing with a serial killer (Kevin Spacey) who is targeting people he thinks represent one of the seven deadly sins. Somerset also befriends Mills' wife, Tracy (Gwyneth Paltrow), who is pregnant and afraid to raise her child in the crime-riddled city.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: When the body of an 11-year-old boy is found in the Georgia woods, detective Ralph Anderson launches an investigation into the gruesome murder; eyewitnesses and physical evidence point to local teacher and baseball coach Terry Maitland.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Ralph admits to being baffled by conflicting physical evidence; an unexpected tragedy throws the investigation into a tailspin; Glory tries to soothe her daughter Jessa, who says she's been visited by a strange man in her room at night.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Despite being on mandatory leave, Ralph continues to scrutinize the confounding circumstances surrounding the night of the murder; Jack has a hair-raising experience at a remote barn where key evidence and a mysterious substance have been found.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: While retracing the Maitlands' recent family vacation, Holly pursues a possible connection to an eerily similar case and gains valuable insight from local former detective Andy Katcavage; Glory faces increased scrutiny in her daily life.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: After returning from an eye-opening trip to New York, Holly searches for clues at several locations connected to the Dayton case; Jeannie finds herself shaken by an unnerving incident at work and delivers an ominous warning to Ralph.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Holly presents her theory about the connection between two other child murders and the Frankie Peterson case; while Ralph remains skeptical, a more receptive Yunis suggests they start looking into Claude, the last person to have contact with Terry.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Holly tries to help a volatile but conflicted Jack, while their whereabouts are being tracked by Ralph and Alec; after she's confronted by gossip, Glory considers Howie's suggestion on how to secure her family's financial future.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Sensing something ominous afoot, Claude reconnects with his brother in Tennessee, while Holly, Ralph, Yunis, and Andy follow him in hopes of isolating the evil force and thwarting its next kill; a visiting family avoids a dangerous encounter.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: After obscuring their true purpose in town from local police, Ralph and Yunis interview witnesses from the cave festival, while Holly and Andy visit the scene; later, the group considers its next move as Claude deals with the weight of his role.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: The group finds itself in a climactic showdown in their last-ditch effort to root out El Coco.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: When Superman gets drawn into conflicts at home and abroad, his actions are questioned, giving tech billionaire Lex Luthor the opportunity to get the Man of Steel out of the way for good. Will intrepid reporter Lois Lane and Superman's four-legged companion, Krypto, be able to help him before it's too late?

programme.title: Warfare
programme.desc: The harrowing true story of a U.S. Navy SEAL platoon surveillance mission gone dangerously wrong.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Nick Morton is a soldier of fortune who plunders ancient sites for timeless artifacts and sells them to the highest bidder. When Nick and his partner come under attack in the Middle East, the ensuing battle accidentally unearths Ahmanet, a betrayed Egyptian princess who was entombed under the desert for thousands of years. With her powers constantly evolving, Morton must now stop the resurrected monster as she embarks on a furious rampage through the streets of London.

programme.title: The Last House on the Left
programme.desc: Mari and her friend look forward to a holiday at the remote Collingwood lakehouse, but instead an escaped convict (Garret Dillahunt) and his crew kidnap them and later leave them for dead. Mari makes her way back home, where her parents, John (Tony Goldwyn) and Emma (Monica Potter), have unwittingly offered shelter to the thugs. When John and Emma find out what happened to their daughter, they decide to make the strangers rue the day they harmed Mari.

programme.title: Bring Her Back
programme.desc: A brother and sister uncover a terrifying ritual at the secluded home of their new foster mother.

programme.title: Kiss of the Spider Woman
programme.desc: In a prison cell somewhere in Latin America, two very different men warily confront each other. Molina (William Hurt) is first seen wrapping his head in a towel, in the shape of a turban, while Valentin (Raul Julia), bearded and classically macho in appearance, watches with a mixture of fascination and revulsion. During the time spent together, the two men come to understand and respect each other.

programme.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: Following the events in the 1960s, the time leading up to the events of the first film in the Stephen King "It" series.

programme.title: Marcel the Shell With Shoes On
programme.desc: Marcel, a 1-inch-tall shell, lives with his grandmother, Connie, the only residents of their town after their neighbors' sudden, mysterious disappearance. When discovered by a guest amongst the clutter of his Airbnb, the short film he posts online brings Marcel millions of passionate fans and a new hope of reuniting with his long-lost family.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: When a crime brings them back to the mean streets of Los Angeles, fugitive ex-convict Dom Toretto (Vin Diesel) and agent Brian O'Conner (Paul Walker) reignite their high-octane feud. However, when a common enemy rears his head, Dom and Brian must learn how to work together and trust one another in order to defeat him.

programme.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: Following the events in the 1960s, the time leading up to the events of the first film in the Stephen King "It" series.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Uncut Gems
programme.desc: A charismatic jeweler makes a high-stakes bet that could lead to the windfall of a lifetime. In a precarious high-wire act, he must balance business, family and adversaries on all sides in pursuit of the ultimate win.

programme.title: Armed Only With a Camera: The Life and Death of Brent Renaud
programme.desc: On March 13, 2022, filmmaker Brent Renaud was killed by Russian soldiers, the first American journalist to die while reporting on the war in Ukraine; his younger brother and collaborator, Craig Renaud, recovered Brent's body and his final recordings.

programme.title: The Chair Company
programme.desc: After an embarrassing incident at work, William Ronald Trosper finds himself investigating a far-reaching conspiracy.

programme.title: Sinners
programme.desc: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their Mississippi hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.

programme.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: Following the events in the 1960s, the time leading up to the events of the first film in the Stephen King "It" series.

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: Perseus, the son of Zeus, is caught in a war between gods and is helpless to save his family from Hades. With nothing left to lose, Perseus leads a dangerous quest to prevent Hades from overthrowing the king of the gods and laying waste to Earth.

programme.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: Following the events in the 1960s, the time leading up to the events of the first film in the Stephen King "It" series.

programme.title: Weapons
programme.desc: When all but one child from the same classroom mysteriously vanish on the same night at exactly the same time, a community is left questioning who or what is behind their disappearance.

programme.title: Live: What Would You Do?
programme.desc: Using hidden cameras, host John Quiñones observes and comments on how ordinary people behave when they are confronted with dilemmas that require them either to take action or to walk by and mind their own business. Various scenarios are created that force people to make split-second -- and often surprising -- decisions, and variations of the situation (such as changing the genders, races or clothing of the people involved) are often featured to see if different reactions are elicited. Examples of situations on the show include a waitress being harassed by her boss, and a drunken valet trying to park cars.

programme.title: Skate-Doku: Skateboarding im Reservat der Apache
programme.desc: Madars Apse besucht ein Skate-Kollektiv im Reservat von Arizona. Dort wächst mit Apache Skateboards eine Community, die Kultur, Kreativität und Boardsport vereint – mitten in der Wüste.

programme.title: Geschichte von Apache Skateboards: Skate Tales S2 E3
programme.desc: Apache Skateboards ist eine Bewegung, die die historische Kultur der amerikanischen Ureinwohner mit der modernen Skateboard-Ästhetik verbindet und beiden Welten neue Energien verleiht

programme.title: Let It Play S1 E1: Hard Lovin' Woman
programme.desc: Diese packende Rock-Dokumentation erzählt die bisher ungehörte Geschichte der Oscar-nominierten Schauspielerin Juliette Lewis.

programme.title: Against Gravity
programme.desc: Surf-Doku: Olympionike und Deutschlands Top-Surfprofi Leon Glatzer nimmt uns mit auf eine aufregende Reise zu den besten Surfspots der Welt.

programme.title: ABC of... S1 E11: Surfen
programme.desc: Die Surf Masterclass taucht ein in die Welt des Wellenreitens – mit legendären Spots, prägenden Persönlichkeiten wie Kelly Slater und der Leidenschaft, die Surfen zu einem echten Lebensstil macht.

programme.title: Surf Film: RISS mit Carissa Moore
programme.desc: Begleite die legendäre Surferin Carissa Moore während der World Surf League Championship Tour Saison 2019.

programme.title: Doku
programme.desc: Drei junge Jamaikaner erzählen ihre Geschichten. Rapper Bakersteez hofft auf eine internationale Karriere, Shama will Jamaikas erster Pro-Surfer werden und Romar zeigt uns das Leben in seiner Gemeinde

programme.title: Filmbiographie: Big-Wave-Surferin Justine Dupont
programme.desc: Die französische Pro-Surferin Justine Dupont zeigt 2020 eine atemberaubende Saison. A La Folie zeigt Duponts Weg von der Angst hin zur Faszination für Monsterwellen und das Big Wave Surfen.

programme.title: Molly Picklum: What it Takes
programme.desc: Experience the highs and lows of the WSL World Tour and the mid-season cut, with Australian rookie Molly Picklum. Discover the headspace it requires to compete as one of the world's best surfers.

programme.title: Against Gravity
programme.desc: Surf-Doku: Olympionike und Deutschlands Top-Surfprofi Leon Glatzer nimmt uns mit auf eine aufregende Reise zu den besten Surfspots der Welt.

programme.title: Surf Doku: Der Aufstieg zur besten Surferin der Welt
programme.desc: Caroline Marks revolutioniert das Surfen! Mit 13 startete sie ihre Karriere, jetzt jagt sie die größten Titel. Spektakuläre Wellen, beeindruckende Bilder – die Amerikanerin ist die Zukunft des Sports.

programme.title: Surf Film: Bella Vita
programme.desc: Die Wellen der italienischen Küste veranlassen Surfer Chris Del Moro in seine Heimat zu reisen, wo er herausfindet, wie Konventionen und Traditionen zu einem modernen Surf-Lifestyle geführt haben.

programme.title: Shaping Jordy
programme.desc: After 10 years, surfer Jordy Smith returns home to South Africa for the winter. He teams up with Mikey February for an epic road trip. See what they discover in this exciting journey!

programme.title: Doku
programme.desc: Kleine Momente prägen Karrieren ebenso wie große Siege. Kletter-, Surf- und Skatetalente wie Kauli Vaast, Vincent Matheron und Oriane Bertone bereiten sich auf entscheidende Contests vor.

programme.title: Windsurf Doku: The Longest Wave
programme.desc: Eine Doku des Oscar-nominierten Regisseurs Joe Berlinger über die Windsurf-Legende Robby Naish, der alles erreichte und jetzt mit Rückschlägen kämpft.

programme.title: Against Gravity
programme.desc: Surf-Doku: Olympionike und Deutschlands Top-Surfprofi Leon Glatzer nimmt uns mit auf eine aufregende Reise zu den besten Surfspots der Welt.

programme.title: For Reals S1 E2: Felix Baumgartners Sprung aus dem All
programme.desc: Felix Baumgartners Sprung aus dem All, ein BMXer bezwingt den größten Full Loop der Welt: "For Reals" zeigt in kurzweiligen Clips, wie Athleten aus aller Welt die Grenzen des Möglichen ausreizen.

programme.title: Abenteuer-Doku: Die Wiege des kanadischen Kletterns
programme.desc: Zwei Extremkletterer auf Abenteuerkurs: Ihre Reise führt zum legendären Mount Yamnuska – einem der ikonischsten Felsen Kanadas und den Ursprüngen des kanadischen Klettersports.

programme.title: Red Bull Dual Ascent 2024: Highlights
programme.desc: Weltklasse-Kletterer in 10 Teams kämpften darum, bei einem Kopf-an-Kopf-Rennen an der 180 Meter hohen Verzasca-Staumauer in der Schweiz am schnellsten die Wand hochzuklettern.

programme.title: Worldies S1 E11: Adventure
programme.desc: Angefangen bei der Formel 1 über Klippenspringen bis hin zu allem, was dazwischen liegt - jedes dieser "Top-5"-Videos liefert die unglaublichsten Momente, Events und Athleten aller Actionsportarten!

programme.title: Top 5: Die wildesten Stunts aller Zeiten
programme.desc: Fünf der wildesten Stunts überhaupt: vom Wingsuit-Flug mit 180 km/h knapp über dem Boden bis zu waghalsigen Freeruns auf Baukränen über Dubais Skyline – nichts für schwache Nerven!

programme.title: F1-Bolide bahnt sich Weg durch britischen Stau
programme.desc: Der RB7 im britischen Stau: Der legendäre F1-Bolide bahnt sich mit Tempo und Witz den Weg durch Taxis, Studentenautos und schräge Verkehrsteilnehmer – ein rasantes Rennen mit britischem Humor.

Angry and dejected, the lovably foulmouthed teddy bear must now seek legal help from a young lawyer (Amanda Seyfried) and a legendary, civil-rights attorney (Morgan Freeman) to get the justice he deserves.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.desc: After Florida mother Gretchen Anthony, 51, goes missing from her home, surveillance video tells a twisted tale of her final hours.

programme.title: Sex & Murder
programme.desc: A romantic and scenic early morning boat ride turns deadly when Larry Isenberg falls overboard; investigators reveal the disappearance of half a million dollars, which could be motive for murder.

programme.title: Sex & Murder

programme.desc: A string of horrifying fires plagues California in the Eighties and Nineties, one of them fatally trapping four people inside.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemort's return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teacher's constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: The return of Lord Voldemort wreaks havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds. Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledore's death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harry's home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestrange's clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledore's tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemort's soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix' vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: The year is 1926, and Newt Scamander has just completed a global excursion to find and document an extraordinary array of magical creatures. Arriving in New York for a brief stopover, he might have come and gone without incident, were it not for a No-Maj named Jacob, a misplaced magical case, and the escape of some of Newt's fantastic beasts, which could spell trouble for both the wizarding and No-Maj worlds.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents' deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potter's adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the network's money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the city's subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: Hondo Lane offers to keep an abandoned mother-son duo safe during an Apache attack. Along the way, he forms a strong bond with them. What challenges await them? Will they manage to survive?

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthor's nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone' in the first `Superman' movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helplessly.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kent's class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma, having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Nuclear Man, Lex Luthor's latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race and sees the android, which is made from Kryptonite, as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger rides into a small frontier town in the American southwest, provoked into a gunfight in which he kills three men, and then begged by the townsfolk to become sheriff. The residents are terrified of the gunslinger but live in greater fear of a gang which intends to wipe out the whole town.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthor's nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman III

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace

Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race and sees the android, which is made from Kryptonite, as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Dumb & Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owner's kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but she's smitten with wealthy classmate Blane who might be interested if she wasn't so poor. Do the pair have a future together?

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red' Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieri's Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozart's progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguire's personal life starts to fall apart as he's torn between love and money in Cameron Crowe's metaphor on Americans' need for success and money.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: A teenage girl wants revenge on the man who killed her father, but she needs help from legendary one-eyed marshal `Rooster' Cogburn, and a Texas Ranger.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA agent comes up against a duplicitous American government during his quest to nab a Colombian drug lord.

Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the president's bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA agent comes up against a duplicitous American government during his quest to nab a Colombian drug lord.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: A true story of two remaining officers desperately trying to rally their meagre force of 105 men against 4,000 attacking Zulu warriors. Cetewayo, ruler of the Zulu kingdom, begins his war against the white invaders with the annihilation of the British army at Isandhlwana and moves on to his next target - the depleted garrison at Rorke's Drift.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in America's former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a string of brutal murders terrorises London, it does not take long for legendary detective Sherlock Holmes and his crime-solving partner, Dr Watson, to find the killer, Lord Blackwood. A devotee of the dark arts, Blackwood has a bigger scheme in mind, and his execution plays right into his plans. The game is afoot when Blackwood seems to rise from the grave, plunging Holmes and Watson into the world of the occult and strange technologies.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austria's crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: The disturbing story of the making of the infamous 60s underworld figures Reggie and Ronnie Kray - from their upbringing by a domineering mother in the deprivation of London's East End. The gangland empire they build is characterised by violence and intimidation, and the film is unflinching in its depiction of their rise to power.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who murdered five people, apparently at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of US soldiers.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoner's psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in America's former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a travelling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoner's psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows

However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: A juror for a high-profile murder trial finds himself struggling with a serious moral dilemma that could influence the verdict and potentially convict, or free, the accused killer.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Another great white shark arrives to terrorise the holiday resort of Amity Island. Having recovered from the grisly events of four years ago, the island is once again packed with tourists. Families are sailing in the bay and swimming off the beach, but when two divers and a water-skier go missing, the local police chief fears that he is about to relive his greatest nightmare.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russia's first nuclear submarine and his executive officer's first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take, mall-time drug lords, sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill. For police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: A juror for a high-profile murder trial finds himself struggling with a serious moral dilemma that could influence the verdict and potentially convict, or free, the accused killer.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: A high school coach hunts down the men responsible for an underground human trafficking operation.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter, and a servant, forcing them to seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how it was committed.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officer's unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, a Harvard symbologist is surprised to be approached by the Pope's emissaries for help. Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielberg's 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Now You See Me

programme.title: Lawless

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: When his wife and children are killed by Florida drug lord Howard Saint, vengeful FBI agent Frank Castle turns vigilante and dedicates himself to wrecking Saint's life. He sets up camp in a crummy apartment, but finds his neighbours a little too neighbourly, and they end up involved in his vengeful plan.

programme.title: Sew Torn
programme.desc: A seamstress gets tangled in her own thread after stealing a briefcase from a drug deal gone bad. In an escalating game of cat and mouse, her different choices lead to drastically different outcomes along the way.

programme.title: The Line
programme.desc: A university student lives life without fear of consequences.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original group's way of life.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Jaws III

programme.title: Angels & Demons

Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A man revisits his childhood beach to surf with his son. Humiliated by locals, he becomes entangled in an escalating conflict that pushes him to his limits.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russia's first nuclear submarine and his executive officer's first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.desc: When his wife and children are killed by Florida drug lord Howard Saint, vengeful FBI agent Frank Castle turns vigilante and dedicates himself to wrecking Saint's life. programme.title: My Favorite Girlfriend
programme.desc: Conrad's meticulously organized lifestyle is upended when he meets Molly, an enigmatic woman who seems to share headspace with multiple other women with distinct identities - each with traits that Conrad finds lovable.

programme.title: Forever In My Heart
programme.desc: Jenna and Charlie found love in Ireland but their dreams drove them apart. Five years later, they reunite and Jenna has to decide where her heart belongs—back home or in the Emerald Isle.

programme.title: Cooking with Love
programme.desc: Hardworking & optimistic television producer, Kelly, doesn't have time for love. Along with her mentor Amanda, Kelly dives into another season of the Little Gourmet, a kids cooking show, when hot-headed Chef Stephen is dropped into Kelly's life as a last minute replacement host.

programme.title: Just My Luck
programme.desc: Sexy Manhattanite Ashley is known as the luckiest woman around, but after a chance romantic encounter with down-and-out Jake, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

programme.title: Basmati Blues
programme.desc: Linda Watt (Brie Larson: Room, 21 Jump Street) is a sheltered but brilliant young scientist who is plucked out of her company's lab and sent to India by her CEO (Donald Sutherland: The Hunger Games) to sell "Rice 9," a genetically modified rice she's created.

programme.title: Love at Sunset Terrace
programme.desc: Tired of her fast-paced life in the city, Sophie Carter travels to a small seaside town to disconnect and self-reflect, staying at an Airbnb run by a widowed father of a young girl.

programme.title: Aristotle and Dante
programme.desc: Mexican teenagers Aristotle Mendoza and Dante Quintana explore their friendship while struggling with racial and ethnic identity, sexuality and family relationships in 1987 El Paso, Texas. Based on the book by Benjamin Alire Sáenz

programme.title: Elvis And Anabelle
programme.desc: After a miracle, a beauty queen and a small town boy are thrown together in this life affirming story of young love.

programme.title: Alone Together
programme.desc: Two strangers wind up double-booked in the same New York rental at the start of quarantine. Exasperating the situation, these polar opposites must learn to cope with each other's eccentricities, realizing they have more in common than meets the eye.

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: A womanizing Viagra salesman with no sense of direction or responsibility falls in love with a free-spirited woman.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Emperor from 200 B.C. China unearths a two thousand-year-old nightmare, a secret that should have remained buried.

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Compromised by his affair with the first lady, a veteran secret service agent is framed as a potential presidential assassin and must rely on a hostile former protégé to flush out the real culprit.

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: Two women become bank robbers to help the poor and seek revenge on a ruthless land baron.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: They chose the worst man for the job. They expected him to fail, but he wasn't about to let a witness be murdered on his watch. Personal demons put Jack a New York City cop at rock bottom.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

programme.title: Snitch
programme.desc: In the fast-paced action thriller SNITCH, Dwayne Johnson stars as a father whose teenage son is wrongly accused of a drug distribution crime and is looking at a mandatory minimum prison sentence of 10 years.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer Aimes is just your average, undercover, super-assassin accustomed to a life of flashy sports cars and even flashier women. But when he meets Jen Kornfeldt, a fun-loving computer tech, he finds true love… and happily trades international intrigue for domestic bliss.

programme.title: Conan The Barbarian
programme.desc: The most legendary Barbarian of all time is back. A quest that begins as a personal vendetta for the fierce Cimmerian warrior soon turns into an epic battle against hulking rivals, horrific monsters, and impossible odds, as Conan realizes he is the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria.

programme.title: The Sweeney
programme.desc: Detective Inspector Jack Regan (Ray Winstone) and his loyal partner George Carter (Ben Drew) are old school crime fighters enforcing the law in a modern underworld.

programme.title: Son of a Gun
programme.desc: JR busts out of prison with Brendan Lynch, Australia's most notorious criminal, and joins Lynch's gang for a gold heist that soon pits the two men against one another.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: FBI agent Malcolm Turner is known best for being a brilliant, master of disguise. Malcolm's latest assignment sends him to small-town Georgia, where he's assigned to trap a brutal bank robber who the FBI suspects will be coming down to visit his ex-girlfriend Sherry and her son.

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: In this classic romantic comedy, a Brooklyn widow (Cher) is ready to get married again. Only this time, she plans on doing it right, even if she has to say “yes” to a man she doesn't really love.

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Big Momma is back — and this time he has big backup: his teenage stepson Trent (Brendan T. Jackson). Martin Lawrence returns as FBI agent Malcolm Turner and as Turner's deep-cover alter-ego Big Momma.

programme.title: Girl Most Likely
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig stars as Imogene, once a promising young New York playwright whose promise has fizzled, thanks to a crisis of confidence. Heavily in denial about being dumped by her society boyfriend, Imogene uses her skill for drama to stage an elaborate fake suicide as an appeal for his sympathy.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back In Business
programme.desc: The buzz is back in Barbershop 2. Calvin is struggling to keep his father's shop alive, this time against urban developers looking to replace "mom & pop" establishments with name-brand chains. The world changes, but some things never go out of style...

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Undercover Agent Malcolm Turner is back and this time he's out to expose the suspected designer of a deadly computer "worm" that would allow outside forces access to sophistical and critical government intelligence files.

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: A couple going through a divorce squabble over custody of their beloved dog.

programme.title: Yes, God, Yes
programme.desc: Growing up in the Midwest in the early OOs, sixteen-year-old Alice has always been a good Catholic. But when an innocent AOL chat turns racy, she discovers masturbation and is overwhelmed with guilt. Seeking redemption, she attends a mysterious religious retreat to try and suppress her urges...

programme.title: A Good Old Fashioned Orgy
programme.desc: A Comedy About Old Friends In New Positions. A Good Old-Fashioned Orgy is about a close group of 30-somethings who spend every weekend of the summer throwing elaborate parties at the house belonging to group member Eric in the Hamptons.

programme.title: The Legend of Barney Thomson
programme.desc: Comedy drama as Robert Carlyle plays Barney Thomson, a downtrodden barber who has fallen from grace in his meagre barbering life. One day whilst almost losing his job, Barney comically falls into the unthinkable role of a serial killer.

programme.title: Chef

The Mouse Fairy has not been. She has been captured in one of Gargamel's Smurf traps. And now the evil wizard is concocting a dreadful plan.

programme.title: Smurfs On Wheels

All the other Smurfs are too busy – and too lazy – to walk. But then Handy comes up with what he calls his Customised Smurfwagon. No need to walk, you just let yourself roll along... Of course, things won't be as simple as all that.
