Dabbler wants to become a doctor and all of the Smurfs, with Papa Smurf in the lead, are going to help him to achieve his wish.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All The Smurf's A Stage: Poet Smurf's new play is going to be his greatest work ever, and it will feature the most favourite Smurf of all: Smurfette in the leading female role. All the other Smurfs vie for the honour of playing opposite Smurfette. Even Timid Smurf, who is the shy and retiring type, is a candidate for the part. Brainy Smurf, self-appointed manager of the play, does not see it that way...

programme.title: Reckless Smurfs
programme.desc: This time, Gargamel's plan cannot fail. Undeterred by Azrael's derisive cackling, the evil wizard perfects a magic substance called Daredevil Dust, which is going to change all the Smurfs into rash, incautious swashbucklers. Will Papa Smurf fall into Gargamel's trap? Will their enemy catch all the Smurfs? Will this story have a happy ending?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Most Popular Smurf: Jokey's surprise exploding packages have been changed by a spell. Picture the practical joker's discombobulating when he realises that all the surprises that he hands to unsuspecting Smurfs contain nothing but real gifts! No more ka-boom, no more jokes, no more fun! Plus the unenviable new position of Most Popular Smurf in the Village, surrounded by admirers begging for more presents...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Three Smurfketeers: In another Smurf theatrical super-production based – very loosely – on Alexandre Dumas' characters, a masterpiece of the stage is created, with a few lines from Romeo and Juliet thrown in.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Christmas: The Smurfs come to the rescue of two children and their grandfather when a mysterious stranger appears and causes their sleigh to crash. Knocking on Gargamel's door for help puts them and the Smurfs in danger…

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Clockwork Smurf: Handy has built a very complex Smurf machine that does everything. It proves dangerous when it nearly destroys the village, but comes in useful when, with the help of the other Smurfs, it saves the young prince Gerard's kingdom from the queen aunt Imperia's dastardly intentions.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fountain Of Smurf: The Smurfs discover a fountain of youth that is guarded by a wicked troll, who steals Papa Smurf's magic book. They convince Gargamel to help them and the greedy villain runs to get the water, but manages to fall in with the troll. As the two chase each other all over the countryside, the Smurfs are able to retrieve Papa Smurf's book.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Once In A Blue Moon: Once in a blue moon, as the legend goes, a baby Smurf is delivered to the Smurfs and everyone in the village becomes attached to the new arrival. But a mistake has been made and the stork returns to take the baby back. Grouchy and Smurfette have become so attached to the baby that the baby is returned.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Supersmurf: Bigmouth steals the Smurfs' winter food supply and Brainy concocts one of Papa Smurf's magic strength potions so he can fight the greedy giant. The super formula wears off, but Papa Smurf works a fast switch, replacing the food with rocks and Bigmouth is none the wiser.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fake Smurf: Hogatha turns herself into a Smurf, plotting revenge on the little people for destroying her magic locket. Papa Smurf outwits her and banishes her from the forest once more.

programme.title: The Baby Smurf
programme.desc: Gargamel turns himself into a Baby Smurf, to be adopted by the Smurfette. He causes complete chaos in the Smurf Village when he tries to blow it up with a time bomb! Papa Smurf discovers his evil plot and uses the explosive to send the wizard back to his dismal castle.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Haunted Smurf: The Smurfs' winter food supply is destroyed and they journey to a distant castle in search of shelter. Initially, they think the castle is haunted, but after they solve the mystery of a greedy pack of rats, the grateful owner presents them with an abundance of food for their long winter.

programme.title: The Purple Smurfs
programme.desc: The purple fly bites Lazy and an epidemic starts that turns the little villagers into angry, purple Smurfs. Papa Smurf discovers that the pollen from a tuberose flower is an antidote and soon things are smurfy again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Magnifying Mixture: Brainy makes an enlarging potion that turns Hefty into human size. The big-little strong man captures Gargamel and brings him back to the Smurf Village where Papa Smurf magically causes Azrael to chase his master back to his dreary castle.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Now You Smurf 'Em, Now You Don't: The underground trolls who want them to be their slaves capture the Smurfs. Papa Smurf ingeniously frees them and then destroys the trolls' magic crystal ball that gives them power over the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel The Generous: In an effort to find out where the Smurfs' secret diamond stash is hidden, Gargamel pretends to be their friend. When he shows his true, wicked self, Papa Smurf works a magic spell to save his little Smurfs from the vicious clutches of the evil wizard.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Paradise Smurfed: Lazy dreams he is on Paradise Island and free from all the work Papa Smurf inflicts on him. His fantasy turns into a nightmare that sends him eagerly back to work once more.

programme.title: The Abominable Snowbeast
programme.desc: Brainy and his friends organize a journey to Ice Mountain to pick the rare snow flower for Papa Smurf. They meet a terrifying snow beast that befriends them, due to Smurfette's kindness, and helps them find the tiny flower.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sister Smurf: Smurfette has found a new friend, Laura, a six-year-old child whose parents live near the forest. Together, the two girls wander in the forest. But an old witch who lives in the forest catches them.

programme.title: Gormandizing Greedy
programme.desc: Greedy overdoes it. He's getting heavier and heavier until his weight puts him in jeopardy. The evil Gargamel is going to catch him... Can Greedy be saved by Papa Smurf?

programme.title: Head Over Hogatha
programme.desc: Valentine's Day. Hogatha, the witch, is at the pond picking spore rot when, by accident, one of Cupid's arrows hits her. Now she is going to fall madly in love with the first man she sees... And as luck would have it, that man is Gargamel himself. Will he succeed in having her catch all the Smurfs in one fell swoop and will Hogatha get out of her fell swoop?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Put Upon Puppy: Life in the Smurf Village might be more peaceful if Puppy's behavior were a little more considerate. But the little Smurf dog is digging up Smurfette's flowers, dirtying Vanity's new wallpaper or ruining Papa Smurf's experiments. Yet Puppy's going to help the Smurfs out of a trap contrived by Gargamel... Or maybe he won't be disciplined enough...

programme.title: The Gallant Smurf
programme.desc: Queen Felicity will not let her son, Prince Godfrey, marry his sweetheart Pricilla. What she wants as a daughter-in-law is a girl who shows her something she's never seen before. When Hogatha learns of this, and also discovers the existence of Grandpa Smurf, she feels confident that she can surprise the Queen with her capture. Of course, Hogatha must first capture Grandpa Smurf...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tattle-Tail Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's had enough. The Smurflings and Sassette keep on telling tales about him with unpleasant results. He therefore concocts a magic formula, taken from Papa Smurf's books of spells, which makes the little Smurfs' tails grow longer and longer every time they tell tales. What he hasn't counted on is that Gargamel now has a way of catching the Smurflings.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Loss Of Smurfs: When the emergency call rings, all the Smurfs in the Village drop what they are doing and run to hear the news. But when Vanity Smurf calls for an assembly so that the Smurfs can admire his new hat, it is too much. They send him on his way out of the village, and Vanity has the bad luck of meeting Lofty, the Elf, who suggests a horrible mud bath...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Prince And The Hopper: What is that strange talking frog that Morlock the Wizard sends all of Prince Theodore's soldiers to catch? Is it a demon frog, as he says, or something else? Truth will out when Smurfette and the Smurflings meet the frog. They help to change this frog back into Prince Theodore himself, for he's been the victim of a spell cast by Morlock.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lost Smurf: Every 500 years, Castle Captor appears and abducts innocent travelers. Grandpa takes off in his balloon for the castle, where he meets Nanny Smurf, who's been missing for 500 years. They have only a short time to escape, or they'll become permanent guests!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Land Of The Lost And Found: Hefty, Handy, and Brainy lose Papa's telescope and Scour, the Lord of Lost and Found, finds it. The Smurfs say they'll trade anything to get it back, so Scour takes their most valuable possessions – handiness, heftiness and braininess. They journey to his domain to retrieve what was lost.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Archives Of Evil: The evil warlock Nemesis shows up at the Wizards' Library to steal the knowledge from the Archives of Evil and so get the Long Life Stone. But it's Brainy who inadvertently saves the day when he switches Greedy's cookbook and Papa's spell book.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A House For Nanny: Roommates Smurfette and Nanny are getting on each other's nerves, so the time has come for Nanny to have a house of her own. As Nanny and Smurfette trek off to find a house-warming plant, the others design the Smurfliest house for her.

programme.title: Smurfing For Ghosts
programme.desc: Peewit is at the castle of his friends Selwyn and Tallulah when Uncle Fenwick, the friendly ghost, asks for his help in chasing a few relatives who've come to haunt him... Peewit has to get help from the Smurfs, and a merry chase begins...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Grouchy Makes A Splash: We all know Grouchy Smurf hates a lot of things. But one thing he hates more than anything else is water, when there is enough of it to drown in. You see, Grouchy can't swim. And when the Smurfs notice this peculiarity and try to teach him how to survive in water, the evil wizard Gargamel makes things a little more dangerous than they ought to be....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - No Smurf Is An Island: Handy Smurf is the one who fixes everything that needs mending in the Village of the Smurfs. But are his efforts really appreciated by the other Smurfs? Not at all. At least this is what Handy feels when he resolves to leave the Smurfs Village forever and live in the sea with Marina the Mermaid...

programme.title: The Answer Smurf
programme.desc: Nobody ever listens to Brainy Smurf's advice, and when Papa Smurf is away and Brainy feels he's in charge, he decides he's going to be the one with all the answers. There is a magic formula in Papa Smurf's Book of Spells that ensures everyone in the Village of the Smurfs is going to ask for Brain's opinion. As if matters weren't difficult enough, here's Gargamel...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Tallest Smurf: Smurfs are three apples high. Smurflings are twenty-five smurfberries high. Except for Slouchy, who only measures twenty-two smurfberries. Apart from Baby Smurf, Slouchy is the shortest Smurf, and the jibes and taunts of the other Smurflings make him wish he were the tallest of the Smurfs... Now it so happens that Gourdy the Genie loves to grant wishes...

programme.title: Smurfette's Gift
programme.desc: Every year, Smurfette snoops around to discover what her birthday presents will be before she receives them. But this year, Sassette has created the Keep-Smurfette's-Presents-a-Surprise-Committee. Nat has discovered a cave where they might be able to hide all the gifts prepared by the Smurfs. But what this cave also hides is a greedy imp who is not only interested in keeping Smurfette's gifts...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sassette's Tooth: Oh dear! Sassette has lost a tooth. Papa Smurf explains that if she puts her tooth under her pillow, the Mouse Fairy will bring her a present in the morning. But the next morning there is no present under the pillow. The Mouse Fairy has not been. She has been captured in one of Gargamel's Smurf traps. And now the evil wizard is concocting a dreadful plan.

programme.title: Smurfs On Wheels
programme.desc: Every year, all the Smurfs make the long hike to Dreamy Steamy Springs. But this year, only Grandpa Smurf, Papa Smurf and Nat are going to walk there. All the other Smurfs are too busy – and too lazy – to walk. But then Handy comes up with what he calls his Customised Smurfwagon. No need to walk, you just let yourself roll along... Of course, things won't be as simple as all that.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Calling Dr Smurf: As his name implies, Dabbler Smurf is incapable of staying put in any one activity. He goes from one pursuit to another with the greatest of ease and never finishes what he's begun. But suddenly here he is smitten by the love of the medical profession. Dabbler wants to become a doctor and all of the Smurfs, with Papa Smurf in the lead, are going to help him to achieve his wish.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All The Smurf's A Stage: Poet Smurf's new play is going to be his greatest work ever, and it will feature the most favourite Smurf of all: Smurfette in the leading female role. All the other Smurfs vie for the honour of playing opposite Smurfette. Even Timid Smurf, who is the shy and retiring type, is a candidate for the part. programme.title: Frasier

programme.desc: Not sure whether to end his relationship with his current girlfriend Claire after having romantic dreams about Lana, Frasier is plagued by the unwanted advice of his exes, Lilith and Diane.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne feels threatened when Niles begins counselling an attractive female patient, and a cricket gets on Frasier's nerves.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A trendy new pastor asks Homer to be a church deacon, but when Homer starts to get a little too fervent, Bart asks Flanders for help finding their former pastor.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge hires a beautiful piano instructor to help Bart explore his creative side; Homer loses his last two hairs.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Manuel and his son Marvyn have decided to join forces to find the perfect holiday home that the whole family can enjoy. They think Alicante in Spain is the perfect place. Leah Charles-King helps them find the right fit for their budget of £130,000.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Antoinette and Carmen welcome their rivals to the Seacrest Hotel in Portsmouth, where the dazzling décor, a super night's sleep and an egg-cellent breakfast impress their guests.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Best mates Glenn and Leon host at The White Horse Hotel in Storrington in West Sussex. There are hair-raising concerns and damp discoveries, and for some guests it's too close for comfort.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Husband and wife Mike and Del give their guests a real taste of Wales at Deri-Down Guest House in Abergavenny. However, bed blunders and a pre-order breakfast leave some of them wanting more.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Mother and son Margaret and Fraser host at Royle Farm B&B in Burton-on-Trent in Staffordshire, where some guests fixate on the fantastical furniture and others feel askew about the view.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It's the final day and the B&Bers meet for one last time to settle some scores. After bedtime blues and follicle findings are aired, the payments are revealed and the winner is announced.

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George meets a young couple turning a derelict water pumping station into a luxury holiday home. A dedicated outdoor swimmer builds himself a futurist micro camper. And George visits a glamping pod up a tree in a Danish forest.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: It's the quarter-final and Dessert Week, as the bakers face three dessert-based challenges. First up, they bake Basque-style cheesecake, before Prue sets a pudding challenge in the Technical. Finally, they must create a trifle for the Showstopper.

programme.title: Channel 4 News [NEW]
programme.desc: Channel 4's flagship news programme. With sport and weather.

programme.title: Bettany Hughes' Treasures of the World [NEW]
programme.desc: Bettany Hughes uncovers some of Bulgaria's rich cultural and historical treasures. She explores the Belogradchik Rocks and the storied prehistoric paintings of Magura Cave. In Sozopol, she dives with archaeologists to reveal ancient underwater ruins.

programme.title: Great British Train Journeys From Above [NEW]
programme.desc: In England, the North Yorkshire Moors Railway travels from Whitby to Pickering, transporting us back in time to the golden age of steam train travel.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: Widows
programme.desc: A police shootout leaves four thieves dead during an explosive armed robbery attempt in Chicago. Their indebted widows must now join forces to pull off their own heist and forge a future for themselves.

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon visits West Dover in Vermont to try to save a dog-friendly hotel that's desperately in need of help. Sandy MacDougall, the owner, runs the Four Seasons Inn.

programme.title: Car S.O.S

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver cooks up three delicious one-pan recipes: his super-speedy smoked salmon pasta, a loaded beef burger with sweet red peppers, pickles and mustard, and gorgeously soft and sticky toffee apple buns.

programme.desc: In Poole in Dorset, Sue and Roy are at an impasse over whether to love or list their extraordinary four-bed chalet bungalow complete with a pool. Sue is ready to downsize, but knows that they can't sell the house in its current state.

programme.title: Cheers

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Coach is taken with his charming neighbour and Carla and Diane urge him to try flirting with her. However, he doesn't manage to succeed until he pretends to injure himself by falling down stairs.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: When Red Sox pitcher Rick Walker falls into a slump and asks his idol Sam for advice. Sam is very happy to be able to relive his glory day and reluctantly parts with his good luck charm.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: While Diane keeps notes on bar conversations, a novice comes in for one final fling before entering a monastery. At the same time, a World War One veteran shows up for a very small reunion.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray discovers that Debra becomes more passionate when she argues with Marie, so he concocts a series of lies in an attempt to boost his love life.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: The King of Queens

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: While Martin prepares for his first night's work as a security guard, a busy Frasier, Niles and the gang fuss over who will get stuck with walking Eddie, prompting a peeved Martin to recall his tragic last night as a cop, and his partner's warning not to let his family become strangers to each other. Meanwhile, Daphne and Niles are in a dither when they each buy tickets to rival concerts on the same night.

programme.desc: Julie and her friend Sarah plan to give the B&Bers a touch of luxury at Ullswater View in the Lake District. The group brave wet, windy conditions during a boat trip on the lake, and vibrant views from the breakfast room boost everyone's spirits.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The host in Belfast is finance worker Andrea, who's throwing a Belfast-themed evening chock-full of local lingo and simple-but-effective fare. Kirsty is impressed by Andrea's homemade pasta, but the spice isn't right for her in the starter.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun [NEW]
programme.desc: Foluke and Alex see what Paphos has to offer for £100,000, from a modern apartment with a homely feel, to a light and bright harbour-side apartment. But will any entice them to put in an offer?

programme.title: Channel 4 News [NEW]
programme.desc: Channel 4's flagship news programme. With sport and weather.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off [NEW]
programme.desc: In a Signature that demands utter precision and perfect lamination, the bakers make cream horns worthy of a Parisian patisserie window, before taking on a sugar glass dome. Finally, the bakers create a spectacular and impressive macaron sculpture.

programme.title: Worlds Apart
programme.desc: The treasure hunt heats up in Japan's kitchen, Osaka, as the four remaining duos tackle the first group challenge. Bonds deepen, before a shock departure shakes up the competition.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The new series continues, as this time Britain's sharpest armchair critics watched The Celebrity Traitors, Strictly Come Dancing, Hollyoaks, Dragons' Den, Beat the Chasers, Celebrity Help! My House is Haunted and BBC News (Prince Andrew).

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's best-loved personalities have been watching: `The 1% Club', `Spy in The Ocean', `Fake Profile', `This Morning' (rave therapy), `Five Star Kitchen: Britain's Next Great Chef', `The Yorkshire Vet' and ITV News.

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: After a daring attempt to pick up £10,000 in Birmingham, two of the fugitives plunge headlong into a high-stakes race against the hunters as they try to leave the city. Vanishing into the Lake District seems like a great idea for a solo fugitive.

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: Home may be the most dangerous place of all as two of the fugitives return to their hometown, where the hunters are waiting for them. Another pair prepare to split up for safety's sake, but an accidental encounter puts them directly in harm's way.

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam, Josh and Alex are joined by Richard Ayoade, Laura Smyth and Catherine Bohart.

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon checks into Connecticut's oldest inn, the Curtis House in Woodbury. This historic inn has been owned by the Hardisty family for generations, but the business has started to fall apart and their legacy is on the brink of being lost.

programme.title: Will AI Take My Job? Dispatches
programme.desc: Millions of workers in the UK could lose their jobs because of the artificial intelligence revolution. According to experts the impact on a range of industries could be dramatic, with skilled work particularly affected.

programme.title: Grand Designs: Deconstructed [NEW]
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud and Greg James dish the dirt on the latest episode of `Grand Designs'. Piers and Emma chat about the towering complexities and costs of their 21st-century castle.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie catches up with Gary and Bill, who were torn over their four-bed Victorian cemetery lodge in Edinburgh. Gary was fed up with its higgledy-piggledy layout, whereas Bill loved their home's unique features.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Desiree Burch in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: When Doug and Carrie offer to pay damages for rear-ending Deacon and Kelly's car, it causes friction between the two couples. What was the cause of the accident?

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie brings Doug to her company retreat for the weekend. When Carrie tries to get Doug to look like a successful person he ends up putting on a bad show.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Arthur's hostility towards the whole concept of Halloween reveals that he has some real-life ghosts to exorcise.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray can't believe the family is so upset about what he said to one of the kids' friends when he was only trying to be funny.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Frank loses his sense of taste. Is it a side effect of his potency medication, and will he have to tell Marie that he is receiving chemical assistance?

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray tells Robert that Amy talks too much after she chats with Ray for over an hour while he tries to watch a basketball game on TV.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier loses his cool when he finds out a rival radio host is stealing both his ratings and his agent.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier intervenes when his father is belittled by his supervisor while working nights as a security guard, and a love-sick Roz regales Niles and Daphne with stories about her new boyfriend.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles and Daphne move in together, but their domestic bliss is ruined by a visit from her mother and brother, and an SUV crowds Frasier's parking.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier gives Daphne's brother the boot from the Crane household, and then takes on a vengeful neighbour in a battle of wills.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The guys pick one of the biggest barns they've ever seen in a sprawling Connecticut dairy farm and find some ultra-rare skis for a Model T Ford.

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary

programme.desc: In France, trial guests test out our novice B&Bers' efforts. In Spain, reality sets in for our new bar owners as things really start to take shape. We meet a family chasing their Italian dream. And there's wedding bells in Alicante.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: As the seasons change, mother nature presents new problems for Patrick and Mihaela's country estate. In Italy, Lucie and Jerry may or may not turn a profit from their olive oil.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Sue and Judith host the week's third visit at String of Horses in Cumbria. Their pub-cum-B&B is right in the heart of the local community, and they reckon the B&Bers will be feeling the love.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The host in Belfast is 23-year-old drag artist Aodhan, who kicks off his night with a shock, revealing his alter ego and his horror-themed decor. And while the food gets mixed reviews, an unexpected performance prompts a standing ovation.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun [NEW]
programme.desc: Sammie is set on gorgeous Mallorca, with its stunning beaches, rich history and great climate for family holidays and girly trips. Will a flat next to her favourite bar in Magaluf or a place that takes a trip down memory lane in Alcudia be the one?

programme.title: Channel 4 News

programme.desc: Suranne goes to the US to investigate the Salem witch trials. She explores why accusations of witchcraft spread in Salem with such devastating consequences and how the same mass hysteria overtook the US during the communist witch hunts of the 1950s.

programme.desc: The most exclusive boarding school in the country opens session every summer in Nashville, Tennessee and it's hosted by Travis Kelce and George Kittle. programme.title: Live: NFL GameDay Morning
programme.desc: Rich Eisen leads a cast of NFL talent through four hours of pregame hype, prepping viewers for the kickoffs of Sunday's games. Joining Eisen is Super Bowl champion Kurt Warner, former NFL head coach Steve Mariucci, and special guests each week to break down the matchups. The latest news from around the league, reports from game sites and interviews with players and coaches are featured, and insider Ian Rapoport provides late-breaking news.

programme.title: NFL GameDay Live
programme.desc: Expanding on NFL Network's "GameDay" programming on Sundays during football season, "GameDay Live" updates viewers on what's happening throughout the league. Beginning with kickoff of early-afternoon events and continuing throughout late-afternoon contests, the studio show offers nearly immediate highlights of scoring and other notable plays. But the program is about more than the action; it intersperses highlights of press conferences, interviews with players and coaches, and live reports by announcers at game sites.

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: The Domonique Foxworth Show
programme.desc: Domonique Foxworth shares his take on current sports events and participants.

programme.title: Live: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: ESPN BET Live
programme.desc: ESPN Sports Betting Analysts Erin Dolan and Joe Fortenbaugh, along with host Tyler Fulghum, break down the biggest storylines through the lens of sports betting, with breakdowns, discussions and picks.

programme.title: Overreaction Monday
programme.desc: A weekly staple on 'The Rich Eisen Show' since 2018, 'Overreaction Monday' is now also an extended podcast with Rich and Chris Brockman debating the latest in the NFL.

programme.title: Live: Baseball Tonight
programme.desc: If you're a fan of baseball, then you won't want to miss this show featuring highlights of all the games and updates of ones still in progress. Regularly hosted by Karl Ravech, he's joined by a rotating panel of analysts that includes former players and managers, plus reporters such as Tim Kurkjian and Buster Olney. Other hosts include Adnan Virk and Jon Sciambi.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: The Thing
programme.desc: In remote Antarctica, a group of American research scientists are disturbed at their base camp by a helicopter shooting at a sled dog. When they take in the dog, it brutally attacks both human beings and canines in the camp and they discover that the beast can assume the shape of its victims. A resourceful helicopter pilot (Kurt Russell) and the camp doctor (Richard Dysart) lead the camp crew in a desperate, gory battle against the vicious creature before it picks them all off, one by one.

programme.title: Fright Night
programme.desc: Teenage Charley Brewster is a horror-film junkie, so it's no surprise that when a reclusive new neighbor moves next-door, Brewster becomes convinced he's a vampire. It's also no surprise when nobody believes him. After strange events begin to occur, Charlie has no choice but to turn to the only person who could possibly help: washed-up television vampire killer Peter Vincent.

programme.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
programme.desc: During a hallucinatory incident, young Kristen Parker (Patricia Arquette) has her wrists slashed by dream-stalking monster Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund). Her mother, mistaking the wounds for a suicide attempt, sends Kristen to a psychiatric ward, where she joins a group of similarly troubled teens. One of the doctors there is Nancy Thompson (Heather Langenkamp), who had battled Freddy some years before. Nancy senses a potential in Kristen to rid the world of Freddy once and for all.

programme.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
programme.desc: Grotesque Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund) gives some more suburban teenagers something to dream about.

programme.title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: Hospital emergency room Dr. Daniel "Dan" Challis (Tom Atkins) and Ellie Grimbridge (Stacey Nelkin), the daughter of a murder victim, uncover a terrible plot by small-town mask maker Conal Cochran (Dan O'Herlihy), a madman who's planning a Halloween mass murder utilizing an ancient Celtic ritual. The ritual involves a boulder stolen from Stonehenge, the use of Silver Shamrock masks and a triggering device contained in a television commercial -- all designed to kill millions of children.

programme.title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
programme.desc: The apparently comatose Michael Myers (George P. Wilbur) is being transferred from one hospital to another, but he wakes up when the ambulance crew talk about his surviving niece, Jamie (Danielle Harris). After slaughtering his attendants, Myers sets out to find his one living relative who is, fortunately, being cared for by a kind and resourceful foster sister named Rachel (Ellie Cornell). Meanwhile, the ever-cautious Dr. Loomis (Donald Pleasence) remains on the killer's path.

programme.title: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers
programme.desc: After lying in a coma for a year, Michael Myers (Donald L. Shanks) awakens and stalks his way back to his small hometown in Illinois, intent on killing his niece, Jamie (Danielle Harris), who has been confined to a mental institution since Michael's last attempt to slay her. Suspecting a psychic link between Michael and Jamie, psychiatrist Dr. Sam Loomis (Donald Pleasence) joins forces with Sheriff Ben Meeker (Beau Starr) and attempts to stop Michael's latest rampage.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Nearly two decades after being committed to a mental institution for killing his stepfather and older sister, Michael Myers breaks out, intent on returning to the town of Haddonfield, Ill. He arrives in his hometown on Halloween with the indomitable purpose of hunting down his younger sister, Laurie. The only thing standing between Michael and a Halloween night of bloody carnage is psychologist Dr. Samuel Loomis.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: On a cold Halloween night in 1963, six year old Michael Myers brutally murdered his 17-year-old sister, Judith. He was sentenced and locked away for 15 years. But on October 30, 1978, while being transferred for a court date, a 21-year-old Michael Myers steals a car and escapes Smith's Grove. He returns to his quiet hometown of Haddonfield, Illinois, where he looks for his next victims.

programme.title: Halloween II
programme.desc: After failing to kill stubborn survivor Laurie (Jamie Lee Curtis) and taking a bullet or six from former psychiatrist Dr. Sam Loomis (Donald Pleasence), Michael Myers (Jonathan Prince) has followed Laurie to the Haddonfield Memorial Hospital, where she's been admitted for Myers' attempt on her life. The institution proves to be particularly suited to serial killers, however, as Myers cuts, stabs and slashes his way through hospital staff to reach his favorite victim.

programme.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
programme.desc: In Wes Craven's classic slasher film, several Midwestern teenagers fall prey to Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund), a disfigured midnight mangler who preys on the teenagers in their dreams -- which, in turn, kills them in reality. After investigating the phenomenon, Nancy (Heather Langenkamp) begins to suspect that a dark secret kept by her and her friends' parents may be the key to unraveling the mystery, but can Nancy and her boyfriend Glen (Johnny Depp) solve the puzzle before it's too late?

programme.title: Prince of Darkness
programme.desc: Poking around in a church cellar, a priest (Donald Pleasence) finds an otherworldly vial filled with slime. Frightened, he brings his discovery to a circle of top scholars and scientists, who eventually learn that the strange liquid is the essence of Satan. The slime then begins to seep out, turning some of the academics into zombified killers. As the possessed battle the survivors, student Kelly (Susan Blanchard) is infected by a large quantity of the liquid and becomes Satan personified.

programme.title: Jason X
programme.desc: The year is 2455. The Place is Old Earth. Once the shimmering blue jewel of the galaxy, Old Earth is now a contaminated planet abandoned for centuries. Yet humans have returned to the deadly place that they once fled. Not to live, but to research the ancient rusting artifacts of the bygone civilizations that caused this environmental disaster. And little does the most recent landing party of intrepid young explorers realize the fate that awaits them.

programme.title: House of Wax
programme.desc: A gang of college friends, including Wade (Jared Padalecki) and his girlfriend, Carly (Elisha Cuthbert), are en route to a school football game when they wind up with a flat tire in a ghost town. They are forced to seek help in the only place that's open: the local wax museum. Once inside the spooky and seemingly abandoned building, they find the works on display are not quite what they seem -- and the group soon discovers it's being hunted by the insane twin brothers who run the museum.

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: Alex Browning (Devon Sawa), is embarking on a trip to Paris. Alex experiences a premonition -- he sees the plane explode moments after leaving the ground. Alex insists that everyone get off the plane and 7 people including Alex, are forced to disembark. All watch as the plane actually explodes in a fireball. He and the other survivors have briefly cheated death, but will not be able to evade their fate for very long. One by one, these fugitives from fate fall victim to the grim reaper.

programme.title: Final Destination 2
programme.desc: Kimberly (A.J. Cook) has a premonition of a horrible highway accident killing multiple people -- including her and her friends. She blocks the cars behind her on the ramp from joining traffic -- and as a police trooper (Michael Landes) arrives, the accident actually happens. Now, Death is stalking this group of mistaken survivors -- and one by one they are dying as they were supposed to on the highway.

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: Six years after a group of high-school students first cheated death, another teen (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) has a premonition that she and her friends will be involved in a horrifying roller-coaster accident. When the vision proves true, the student and her fellow survivors must deal with the repercussions of cheating the Grim Reaper.

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: While enjoying a day at the track, Nick O'Bannon (Bobby Campo) has a horrific premonition of his friends and him all dying in a freak accident involving many racecars. Mere seconds before the vision comes true, he manages to convince them to leave. Although they cheat death then, the survivors each begin to meet a grisly end, and Nick tries to figure a way to escape a similar fate.

programme.title: Final Destination 5
programme.desc: During a bus ride with his colleagues to a corporate retreat, Sam (Nicholas D'Agosto) experiences a horrifying vision: the suspension bridge that they -- and many others -- are crossing starts to crumble around them. When his vision ends and, almost immediately, starts to come true, Sam takes quick action that saves a number of people, including his girlfriend, Molly (Emma Bell), and his best friend, Peter (Miles Fisher). However, the survivors soon find that Death will not be denied.

programme.title: Talamasca: The Secret Order
programme.desc: Guy is recruited to join a top-secret spy organization for the supernatural world; he must choose between his old life in the ordinary world and a new life as an undercover spy; Helen deals with trouble at the New York Mother House.

programme.title: Talamasca: The Secret Order
programme.desc: Guy joins the Talamasca, leaving his old life as a lawyer behind; Helen trains him on the ins and outs of undercover work; Guy is sent to London on his first mission - to follow a mysterious hit man.

programme.title: Talamasca: The Secret Order
programme.desc: Guy is recruited to join a top-secret spy organization for the supernatural world; he must choose between his old life in the ordinary world and a new life as an undercover spy; Helen deals with trouble at the New York Mother House.

programme.title: Talamasca: The Secret Order
programme.desc: Guy joins the Talamasca, leaving his old life as a lawyer behind; Helen trains him on the ins and outs of undercover work; Guy is sent to London on his first mission - to follow a mysterious hit man.

programme.title: Talamasca: The Secret Order
programme.desc: Guy is recruited to join a top-secret spy organization for the supernatural world; he must choose between his old life in the ordinary world and a new life as an undercover spy; Helen deals with trouble at the New York Mother House.

programme.title: Talamasca: The Secret Order
programme.desc: Guy joins the Talamasca, leaving his old life as a lawyer behind; Helen trains him on the ins and outs of undercover work; Guy is sent to London on his first mission - to follow a mysterious hit man.

programme.title: The Apparition
programme.desc: Plagued by frightening occurrences in their home, Kelly (Ashley Greene) and Ben (Sebastian Stan) learn that a university's parapsychology experiment produced an entity that is now haunting them. The malevolent spirit feeds on fear and torments the couple no matter where they run. Desperate, Kelly and Ben turn to a paranormal researcher (Tom Felton), but even with his aid, it may already be too late to save themselves from the terrifying presence.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: Paper-hanger Curly is candidate for a brain transplant.

programme.desc: Are you making the most of your Medicare coverage? In this program you will learn about the variety of Humana Medicare plans designed to fit your needs, your lifestyle, and your budget.

programme.desc: Are you making the most of your Medicare coverage? In this program you will learn about the variety of Humana Medicare plans designed to fit your needs, your lifestyle, and your budget.

programme.title: House on Haunted Hill
programme.desc: A millionaire with theatrical tendencies, Stephen Price (Geoffrey Rush) invites a number of people to stay in a vast creepy building that used to be an insane asylum. Stephen, accompanied by his bitter wife, Evelyn (Famke Janssen), offers a million dollars to anyone who can stay the whole night without leaving out of fear. When Stephen and Evelyn become trapped with their guests, they quickly realize that the house really is haunted -- and the spirits dwelling within are very angry.

programme.title: Final Destination 5
programme.desc: During a bus ride with his colleagues to a corporate retreat, Sam (Nicholas D'Agosto) experiences a horrifying vision: the suspension bridge that they -- and many others -- are crossing starts to crumble around them. When his vision ends and, almost immediately, starts to come true, Sam takes quick action that saves a number of people, including his girlfriend, Molly (Emma Bell), and his best friend, Peter (Miles Fisher). However, the survivors soon find that Death will not be denied.

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: Alex Browning (Devon Sawa), is embarking on a trip to Paris. Alex experiences a premonition -- he sees the plane explode moments after leaving the ground. Alex insists that everyone get off the plane and 7 people including Alex, are forced to disembark. All watch as the plane actually explodes in a fireball. He and the other survivors have briefly cheated death, but will not be able to evade their fate for very long. One by one, these fugitives from fate fall victim to the grim reaper.

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: Skeptical graduate student Helen Lyle (Virginia Madsen) befriends Anne-Marie McCoy (Vanessa Williams) while researching superstitions in a housing project on Chicago's Near North Side. From Anne-Marie, Helen learns about the Candyman (Tony Todd), a knife-wielding figure of urban legend that some of her neighbors believe to be responsible for a recent murder. After a mysterious man matching the Candyman's description begins stalking her, Helen comes to fear that the legend may be all too real.

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: Gunned down by Detective Mike Norris (Chris Sarandon), dying murderer Charles Lee Ray (Brad Dourif) uses black magic to put his soul inside a doll named Chucky -- which Karen Barclay (Catherine Hicks) then buys for her young son, Andy (Alex Vincent). When Chucky kills Andy's baby sitter, the boy realizes the doll is alive and tries to warn people, but he's institutionalized. Now Karen must convince the detective of the murderous doll's intentions, before Andy becomes Chucky's next victim.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Repairmen Val McKee (Kevin Bacon) and Earl Bassett (Fred Ward) are tired of their dull lives in the small desert town of Perfection, Nev. But just as the two try to skip town, they happen upon a series of mysterious deaths and a concerned seismologist (Finn Carter) studying unnatural readings below the ground. With the help of an eccentric couple (Reba McEntire, Michael Gross), the group fights for survival against giant, worm-like monsters hungry for human flesh.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature violently kills a man in a Maine lake, Jack Wells (Bill Pullman), the local game warden, looks into the bizarre case, along with Sheriff Hank Keough (Brendan Gleeson) and visiting paleontologist Kelly Scott (Bridget Fonda). Looking for clues in a tooth that the beast left behind, Kelly and the others eventually locate the monster, a massive and vicious reptile eager to devour anything in its path. Can the crocodile-like creature be stopped?

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of an old abandoned church, Trish (Gina Philips) and her brother Darry (Justin Long) watch their routine road trip home from college turn into a heart-stopping race for their lives. They find themselves the chosen prey of an indestructible force that relentlessly pursues them and gives a new and chilling meaning to the old song "Jeepers Creepers.".

Aided by his loyal friend Ray Templeton, Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption, but, finding no help from the police, he must take matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Since Dom (Vin Diesel) and Brian's (Paul Walker) heist in Rio left them and their crew very rich people, they've scattered across the globe; however, they must still live as fugitives, unable to return home to their families. Meanwhile, Agent Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) has been tracking a gang of lethally skilled mercenary drivers whose second-in-command is someone Dom knows. Unable to take them down himself, Hobbs asks Dom and his crew for help in exchange for full pardons for everyone.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: The future of civilization rests in the fate of the One Ring, which has been lost for centuries. Powerful forces are unrelenting in their search for it. But fate has placed it in the hands of a young Hobbit named Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood), who inherits the Ring and steps into legend. A daunting task lies ahead for Frodo when he becomes the Ringbearer - to destroy the One Ring in the fires of Mount Doom where it was forged.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: The sequel to the Golden Globe-nominated and AFI Award-winning "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring," "The Two Towers" follows the continuing quest of Frodo (Elijah Wood) and the Fellowship to destroy the One Ring. Frodo and Sam (Sean Astin) discover they are being followed by the mysterious Gollum. Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), the Elf archer Legolas and Gimli the Dwarf encounter the besieged Rohan kingdom, whose once great King Theoden has fallen under Saruman's deadly spell.

The initial confrontation between the two titans -- instigated by unseen forces -- is only the beginning of the mystery that lies deep within the core of the planet.

Their voyage spirals into chaos when a malevolent mining operation threatens their mission and forces them into a high-stakes battle for survival. Pitted against colossal, prehistoric sharks and relentless environmental plunderers, they must outrun, outsmart and outswim their merciless predators.

programme.title: Pacific Rim Uprising

Jake has since abandoned his training only to become caught up in a criminal underworld. But when an even more unstoppable threat is unleashed to tear through cities and bring the world to its knees, Jake is given one last chance by his estranged sister, Mako Mori, to live up to his father's legacy.

programme.desc: Receiving the Lord's freedom, favor and victory through right believing.

programme.desc: In this weekly program, Dr. David Jeremiah delivers practical messages to the congregation at the Shadow Mountain Community Church in San Diego. Men and women who have been impacted by the Turning Point ministry also share their stories with viewers. During the month of December, "Turning Point" usually features special Christmas programming.

programme.title: Time of Grace With Pastor Mike Novotny
programme.desc: Every believer is in a spiritual battle. Victory depends on being equipped. This message walks through each piece of the armor of God in Ephesians 6, revealing how to stay grounded, guarded and ready, through God's strength and truth.

programme.desc: Dr. Creflo Dollar ministers to people from all backgrounds with hopes for change; Creflo helps viewers find ways to renew their faith, mind, and spirit; based on the belief that the Bible is the written and inspired Word of God, the show is meant to invoke change in the lives of people across the globe; Creflo and his wife, Taffi, share their vision for everyone to hear the Word and gain understanding of God's love and promises.

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: The $10k PCA Main Event is in the money and the field is still filled with talent. As Day 3 continues, the feature table is headlined by high stakes regulars Mustapha Kanit and Chance Kornuth and EPT winner Anton Wigg.

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: It's Final Table time in the $10k PCA Main Event. The winner set to receive a massive $1.5 million. Pedro Neves has the chip leader, but former EPT champion Artur Martirosian looks to add another major title to his impressive resume.

programme.title: PokerStars

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: British pros Charlie Carrel and Liv Boeree get put through the ringer, as Daniel Negreanu and Kevin Hart enjoy early success in the Monte Carlo cash game.

programme.title: PokerStars

programme.title: PokerStars

programme.title: PokerStars

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: A new line-up and a new Challenger. Alex Currie comes to Monte Carlo to play cash poker against his hero, Jaime Staples, plus British pros Jake Cody and Sam Grafton.

programme.title: PokerStars

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: Challenger Alex Currie tries to get the better of his poker heroes at the cash tables in Monte Carlo. But will he be able to bluff EPT champion Jake Cody?

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: At the Monte Carlo cash game, with thousands of Euros in play, online legend Randy Lew takes a seat at the table, and finds the live arena tougher than expected.

programme.title: PokerStars

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: More high stakes cash action from Las Vegas. Bomb pots make their explosive Big Game debut, leaving one player fuming and in need of a reload. Meanwhile, Loose Cannon Jordan Handrich faces off against UK pro Sam Grafton in a hand worth $40,000.

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: It's a high stakes cash game in Vegas with an amateur player competing against the pros. Tonight, Jordan the Loose Cannon goes for bomb pots, while Jennifer Tilly and Sam Grafton spar in multiple hands, with tens of thousands of dollars on the line.

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: Hollywood star Jennifer Tilly continues to crush, as the penultimate session of this high stakes cash game begins. Meanwhile, time is running out for the Loose Cannon to bank a profit, and Gerard Piqué tries to recover some of his five-figure losses.

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: It's all to play for in Las Vegas, as this high stakes cash game concludes. Jennifer Tilly and Sam Grafton battle for supremacy, while Gerard Piqué is determined to finally get the better of the poker pros and dig himself out of a hole.

programme.desc: The European Poker Tour celebrates its 20th anniversary in Barcelona, the city where it all began. Nearly 2,000 players compete in the Main Event for a €1.5m first prize. EPT legends return to the tables and reigning champ Simon Wiciak looks to defend his title.

programme.title: European Poker Tour

programme.title: European Poker Tour

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A social services investigator calls on elderly eccentrics William and Mary Bingham, but he is sent away rudely by their daughter Selina and her husband Eddie Stanton. Artist Maggie Viviani also had a run-in with the investigator, so when his body is found in the river, they all come under suspicion. Barnaby learns that the Binghams never recovered from losing their elder daughter and son in a drowning accident.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young woman is found dressed like a bride and drowned in a bath, it triggers a spate of ghoulish wedding-themed murders in Great Worthy. The case takes Barnaby and Jones to a donkey sanctuary, a heritage steam railway and a pub run by an ex-copper and former brothel madam. Could history be repeating itself?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young female member of a new age cult called The Oblong Foundation goes missing, DCI John Barnaby investigates and sends DS Jones undercover at the cult's base, Malham Hall. The police learn that the hall's previous owners, the Lamberts, died in a gas explosion on board their boat. Barnaby and Jones must try to find out what really happened to the Lamberts - and whether the case has a link to the missing woman.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a farmer is found horribly murdered in the middle of a stone circle, suspicion points at a group of druids. DCI John Barnaby and DS Jones hurry to the scene of the crime, where they are joined by new pathologist Kate Wilding on her first assignment. Druid high priest Leticia Clifford shows Barnaby that sacred ley lines run through the stone circle and later is convinced she has made an exciting discovery.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are sampling the local cider at Midsomer Abbas spring fair when the body of a missing tax inspector is found floating in the cider vat. Meanwhile, publican Samuel Quested says that he wants to restore an ancient rite called the Stag in which men go in search of women from another village in order to 'refresh the gene pool'. As Barnaby and Jones investigate the murder they uncover an array of motives.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones enter the cloistered and old-fashioned world of Midsomer Priory after a nun is found strangled. Jones visits the local pub, where he learns that a woman was seen acting strangely on the day of the murder, and that teenagers in the area sneak into the priory grounds for romantic liaisons. Later, the nuns discover that a valuable silver altar set has vanished, then the chaplain is found murdered.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A row between keen birdwatchers in Midsomer-in-the-Marsh turns nasty when their president is killed. Patrick Morgan met his death while hoping to sight a rare bird, but is his obsession with ornithology to blame - or something more sinister? Barnaby and Jones attempt to discover the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Barnabys plan to renew their wedding vows for their 25th anniversary when Tom is distracted by a murder of a dying man committed with an Indian sword in Badger's Drift.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The naked body of a young woman is found strangled in a local woodland nine years after three identical murders took place there. As DCI Barnaby and DS Troy investigate the killings, they are led further and further into the murky, clandestine world of Midsomer Worthy.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Mysterious events and the discovery of his relative's body lead the residents of Aspern Tallow to believe that Jonathan Lowrie's ghost is at large in their community. DCI Barnaby and DS Troy attempt to determine whether these strange occurrences are supernatural or if there is a more rational explanation.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the sleepy village of Martyr Warren, two opposing groups of travellers have set up home. DCI Barnaby and DS Troy are called in to investigate when the local magistrate, principal adversary of the new arrivals in the village, is found shot dead at his home.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Tails gets trapped in the "Warp of Confusion" (an Escher-like world of another dimension) by Robotnik's cousin, Dr. Warpnik, Sonic comes to the rescue and traps Robotnik and his badniks in the warp.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic and Tails befriend a pair of aliens who crash land their spaceship on Mobius. Sonic has to avoid Robotnik's ULTRA-GRAVITIZER (sort of a hedgehog flypaper) to help fix their ship and blast-off back home.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Coconuts is exiled by Robotnik to a remote jungle, where he uses a giant baby ape to destroy villages. But Sonic exposes Coconuts as a robot, and the baby ape's real Dad takes Coconuts and the baby ape away for a spanking.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Outraged by a new hit song written about Sonic, Robotnik outlaws music on Mobius then takes pop star, Catty Carlisle captive. With his MD (Music Destroyer) Robot, Robotnik terrorizes the music loving Mobius population till Sonic rescues Catty.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: A fast talking, travelling salesman named Wes Weasley sells Robotnik various hedgehog-catching gadgets, including the Darkenator, the Super-duper Gravity Stopper, and the De-Atomizer.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Bob and the gang have got a big job on - repairing some pipework in Farmer Pickles field. / Bob, Scoop & Muck have to make repairs to a tunnel. When they arrive on site, Bob sends Muck ahead into the tunnel with a load of bricks.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: During a mission to one of Robotnik's factories, Sally is taken prisoner by Robotnik and Snively, who construct a roboti-sized "Sally" clone, complete with Sally's personality, and mannerisms. The double tricks Sonic into rescuing "Sally".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and the Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's lab in hopes of deciphering his roboti-sizer system. While underground, Sonic spots his now roboti-sized Uncle Chuck aboard a Badlands bound mine-train and devises a plan for his rescue.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sally, Rotor, Bunnie and Antoine take off in a homemade airplane, bound for an ancient city hidden deep in the Great Mountains, while Sonic follows via his favorite transportation, his sneakers.

programme.title: Sonic The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Outraged by a new hit song written about Sonic, Robotnik outlaws music on Mobius then takes pop star, Catty Carlisle captive. With his MD (Music Destroyer) Robot, Robotnik terrorizes the music loving Mobius population till Sonic rescues Catty.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: In Part II, Sonic and Sally steal the Roboti-sizer plans, stop the Destroyer from polluting the Great Forest and save Little Sonic, Little Sally and Dulcy's mother, Sabina, but are unable to prevent Robotnik from roboti-sizing Uncle Chuck or from relegating the King to the Void. After they return to the present, Sonic laments that the trip was a waste, but Sally reminds him that they came close and they will keep trying until they do triumph over Robotnik.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: On a trip to Port Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia are told that ships are sinking due to the Mobian sea-beast.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik announces that he will marry Queen Aleena in a plot to become the king of Mobius.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A captain of the Queen's guard is captured before he can reach the secret rendezvous where he was to meet Queen Aleena.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A homecoming is interrupted for Sonic, Sonia and Manic when Sleet and Dingo arrive to collect back taxes after returning to their birthplace.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sleet and Dingo plan to collect the taxes owed to Robotnik from the Duke of Velcronia but keep it for themselves.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The sinister Robotnik blackmails Cyrus, an old friend of Sonic's, by holding his father hostage.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: On a trip to Port Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia are told that ships are sinking due to the Mobian sea-beast.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Rumor has it that Queen Aleena's journals are buried in the city of Tashistan. Sonic and his siblings search the city for the scrolls.

programme.title: Sonic The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Tails adopts a cute and fuzzy pet named Walter who turns out to be a black hole who sucks up everything in Mobius. Realizing that Walter is from another dimension our heroes have to return him.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: In 1939, newly created British intelligence agency MI6 recruits Cambridge mathematics alumnus Alan Turing (Benedict Cumberbatch) to crack Nazi codes, including Enigma -- which cryptanalysts had thought unbreakable. Turing's team, including Joan Clarke (Keira Knightley), analyze Enigma messages while he builds a machine to decipher them. Turing and team finally succeed and become heroes, but in 1952, the quiet genius encounters disgrace when authorities reveal he is gay and send him to prison.

programme.title: Rebel Without a Cause
programme.desc: After moving to a new town, troublemaking teen Jim Stark (James Dean) is supposed to have a clean slate, although being the new kid in town brings its own problems. While searching for some stability, Stark forms a bond with a disturbed classmate, Plato (Sal Mineo), and falls for local girl Judy (Natalie Wood). However, Judy is the girlfriend of neighborhood tough, Buzz (Corey Allen). When Buzz violently confronts Jim and challenges him to a drag race, the new kid's real troubles begin.

programme.title: A Bad Idea Gone Wrong
programme.desc: Two would-be thieves forge a surprising relationship with a housesitter when they accidentally trap themselves in a house they just broke into.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: A spoof of the turmoil that afflicted the movie industry in the late 1920s when movies went from silent to sound. When two silent movie stars', Don Lockwood and Lina Lamont, latest movie is made into a musical a chorus girl is brought in to dub Lina's speaking and singing. Don is on top of the world until Lina finds out.

programme.title: An Acceptable Loss
programme.desc: Libby Lamm is a former top national security adviser who, while working with a ruthless, steely-willed political veteran, signed off on a controversial military action that was supposed to end the war on terror. The problem: thousands died under false pretenses. Haunted by what she knows, Libby sets out to tell the truth, risking treason -- and her own life -- to expose a cover-up that stretches all the way to the top.

programme.title: Never So Few
programme.desc: Capt. Tom Reynolds (Frank Sinatra) is the leader of a U.S. military intelligence group stationed in Burma, training Kachin revolutionary troops to fight against encroaching Japanese forces during World War II. Tom leaves on another mission, and when he returns, he discovers that his camp has been overrun by Chinese guerrillas who have killed many of his American and Kachin friends. Enraged, Tom leads an unauthorized mission into China to search for the men who killed his fellow soldiers.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: A comet is hurtling toward Earth and could mean the end of all human life. The U.S. government keeps the crisis under wraps, but crack reporter Jenny Lerner (Tea Leoni) uncovers the truth -- forcing U.S. President Beck (Morgan Freeman) to announce his plan. Grizzled astronaut Spurgeon "Fish" Tanner (Robert Duvall) and his team will land on the comet and lay explosives, hopefully deterring the object from its doomsday course. If not, humanity will have to prepare for the worst.

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: El Tigre Verón
programme.desc: El Tigre Verón, a union leader from the meat industry, must risk everything against his enemies from the bosses' world and justice.

programme.title: Mutiny on the Bounty
programme.desc: On a sea voyage to transport breadfruit to Jamaica, English Captain Bligh (Trevor Howard) abuses his crew and officers enough to anger his 1st Lieutenant, Fletcher Christian (Marlon Brando). When they reach their destination, tensions ease and the crew luxuriates in island life until Bligh claps several men in irons for trying to desert. On the trip home, further indignities inspire Christian to stage a mutiny and set Bligh and those loyal to him afloat in a row boat.

programme.title: The Last Shift
programme.desc: Calling it quits after 38 years, an aging fast-food worker trains his young replacement on the graveyard shift at Oscar's Chicken and Fish.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Never So Few

Tom Reynolds (Frank Sinatra) is the leader of a U.S. military intelligence group stationed in Burma, training Kachin revolutionary troops to fight against encroaching Japanese forces during World War II. Tom leaves on another mission, and when he returns, he discovers that his camp has been overrun by Chinese guerrillas who have killed many of his American and Kachin friends. Enraged, Tom leads an unauthorized mission into China to search for the men who killed his fellow soldiers.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: A comet is hurtling toward Earth and could mean the end of all human life. The U.S. government keeps the crisis under wraps, but crack reporter Jenny Lerner (Tea Leoni) uncovers the truth -- forcing U.S. President Beck (Morgan Freeman) to announce his plan. Grizzled astronaut Spurgeon "Fish" Tanner (Robert Duvall) and his team will land on the comet and lay explosives, hopefully deterring the object from its doomsday course. If not, humanity will have to prepare for the worst.

programme.title: Scaramouche
programme.desc: When the wicked Marquis de Maynes (Mel Ferrer) kills Andre Moreau's (Stewart Granger) best friend in a sword fighting duel and steals his love, Aline (Janet Leigh), the Frenchman vows revenge. While hiding out with a theatrical troupe and posing as the clown Scaramouche, Moreau works with the Marquis' very own fencing instructor to hone his skill with the sword. Once he feels he's up to task, he returns to the city to claim his revenge and win back Aline.

programme.title: High Society
programme.desc: Jazz artist C.K. Dexter Haven (Bing Crosby) is still hung up on his ex-wife and neighbor, socialite Tracy Samantha Lord (Grace Kelly), however Tracy is engaged to another man (John Lund). Matters are complicated even further when a magazine reporter (Frank Sinatra), in town to cover Tracy's wedding, also winds up falling for the beautiful bride-to-be. As Tracy tries to decide on the ideal husband, each suitor works hard to convince her he is the best choice.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: In 1939, newly created British intelligence agency MI6 recruits Cambridge mathematics alumnus Alan Turing (Benedict Cumberbatch) to crack Nazi codes, including Enigma -- which cryptanalysts had thought unbreakable. Turing's team, including Joan Clarke (Keira Knightley), analyze Enigma messages while he builds a machine to decipher them. Turing and team finally succeed and become heroes, but in 1952, the quiet genius encounters disgrace when authorities reveal he is gay and send him to prison.

programme.title: The Harvey Girls
programme.desc: When Susan Bradley (Judy Garland) responded to an ad in New Mexico for a mail-order bride, she had no idea that her would-be husband was a broken-down cowhand. Instead of returning back home, she takes a job at the local Harvey House restaurant. But the new establishment faces tough resistance from the local saloon owner (John Hodiak) and the town's streetwise showgirl, Em (Angela Lansbury). As Susan works with the Harvey girls to win over the townsfolk, she also searches for a new love.

programme.title: Vicious Fun
programme.desc: A horror film critic finds himself in a sticky situation when he stumbles into a self-help group for serial killers.

programme.title: Delivered
programme.desc: Held captive at a remote house, an expectant mother fights for her life against a psychopathic woman who wants her baby.

programme.title: The Last Shift
programme.desc: Calling it quits after 38 years, an aging fast-food worker trains his young replacement on the graveyard shift at Oscar's Chicken and Fish.

programme.title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
programme.desc: The last job of Calvary Captain Nathan Brittles (John Wayne) before retirement is to soothe relations with the Cheyenne and Arapaho Indians after Custer's last stand. At the same time, he must transport the wife (Mildred Natwick) and niece (Joanne Dru) of his commanding officer to a safe destination. After both his missions stall, Brittles attempts a face-to-face meeting with an important Native American chief in order to stave off an impending war.

programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: The Harvey Girls

Instead of returning back home, she takes a job at the local Harvey House restaurant. But the new establishment faces tough resistance from the local saloon owner (John Hodiak) and the town's streetwise showgirl, Em (Angela Lansbury). As Susan works with the Harvey girls to win over the townsfolk, she also searches for a new love.

programme.title: Woman of the Year
programme.desc: Tess Harding (Katharine Hepburn) is a progressively-minded political journalist. Sam Craig (Spencer Tracy) is a sports writer with very traditional values. The only thing the two have in common is that they both work for the same New York City newspaper. Despite an initial and mutual dislike, the two eventually fall in love and get married. When Tess wins the Woman of the Year award, traditional gender roles become flipped and their relationship suffers as a result.

programme.title: Esperando la carroza
programme.desc: Mama Cora's four children argue over who should be forced to care for her in her old age.

programme.title: King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: A rescue party sets out to find an explorer who has disappeared on an African treasure hunt. The search leads the party across the continent and through the terrors of jungle, swamp and desert. Their ultimate destination is the fabled lost mine of Solomon, a source of unimaginable wealth and deadly danger. From H. Rider Haggard's novel.

programme.title: T-34
programme.desc: In 1944, a young lieutenant leads a group of Russian soldiers in a German POW camp and plots a daring escape from captivity in a half-destroyed T-34 tank.

programme.title: Delivered
programme.desc: Held captive at a remote house, an expectant mother fights for her life against a psychopathic woman who wants her baby.

programme.title: Mister Roberts
programme.desc: Bittersweet film about a supply officer aboard a decrepit cargo ship during World War II who yearns for a transfer into a combat zone but is thwarted by the ship's captain, a petty tyrant. Forced to endure various humiliations in exchange for privileges, the crew engage in minor acts of resistance, and look to Mr. Roberts for inspiration and moral support. Based on the hit Broadway play.

programme.title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
programme.desc: The last job of Calvary Captain Nathan Brittles (John Wayne) before retirement is to soothe relations with the Cheyenne and Arapaho Indians after Custer's last stand. At the same time, he must transport the wife (Mildred Natwick) and niece (Joanne Dru) of his commanding officer to a safe destination. After both his missions stall, Brittles attempts a face-to-face meeting with an important Native American chief in order to stave off an impending war.

programme.title: I Confess
programme.desc: Father Logan (Montgomery Clift) is a Catholic priest, but he finds his faith put to the test when he is accused of the murder of a wealthy member of his parish. The real murderer was Otto (O.E. Hasse), a poor German immigrant desperate for money, and Father Logan knows this because Otto confessed it to him. However, Father Logan is bound by the secrecy of the confessional and cannot share this evidence with the police, even if it means his own life.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
